main.name: Rubel Ali
main.description: Developer by day as well as night
main.bio: My name is Rubel Ali, I’m currently pursuing my M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from NIT Delhi, I've a strong foundation in web development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). My focus is on building scalable, user-centric web applications with modern web technologies. I’ve completed diverse projects, including React-based applications like a To-Do List app, Portfolio app and a full-stack e-commerce platform. Beyond development, my research addresses real-world challenges like water pollution, where I’m designing systems for real-time contamination detection and mapping.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed in using React.JS as my main Front end tech stack.

testimonials.text: I've known as an exceptional developer with a keen eye for detail. Mine proficiency in the MERN stack and ability to build user-friendly, scalable applications have consistently impressed them. Mine dedication to continuous learning and problem-solving makes me a standout candidate for any team.
